author.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
author.name: Eric Bai

group.title: Making Connect the Stars
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: In October 2020, Amanda and I released Connect the Stars. This is the story of how it came together!

group.title: Self-Fulfillment Versus Ego
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: Everyone has a desire for some abstract "more". The trick is to figure out which of these desires are healthy.

group.title: Minari - An exercise in empathy
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: MINARI is a gorgeously fleshed out microcosm of the American immigrant experience.

group.title: Connect the Stars — An endless movie trivia game
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: If you enjoy answering "What movies was she in?" and "Who was in that movie again?", you'll enjoy this game!

group.title: M◐◑N DAYS — a web app for creating lunar calendar events
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: My dad celebrates his birthday according to the Chinese calendar, but calendar apps don't support recurring lunisolar events.

group.title: Why I Write
group.author: Eric Bai
group.excerpt: Our bodies were never built to to contain all our thoughts and feelings. So we write.

author.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
